events.message: I placed an order over two weeks ago and still haven't received any shipping updates. The package is very late, and I am concerned about the delay.
The issue has been categorized as a Delivery Delay due to the customer's complaint about late shipping and missing tracking information.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the case regarding the delayed delivery and update the customer accordingly.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear your order hasn't arrived yet. Let's check the status together and find out what's causing the delay.
Could you please provide your order number and the email address used when placing the order? This will help me look up your shipment details.
Thank you. My order number is 456789123 and the email is customer@example.com. I really need to know when the package will arrive.
Iâ€™ve checked your order status with the courier. It appears there was a shipping delay due to weather conditions. Expected delivery is now estimated in three days.
I appreciate the update, but waiting three more days is inconvenient. Is there any way to expedite the shipment or arrange an alternative?
We can offer a partial refund on the shipping cost as a gesture of goodwill and will notify the courier to prioritize your delivery. Will this be acceptable?
Yes, that sounds fair. I appreciate your help and the partial refund offer. Please keep me updated on the shipping progress.
The partial refund has been processed and the courier has been contacted for expedited delivery. We will update you as soon as your package is out for delivery.
Just checking in to confirm that your package was delivered successfully and to ensure you are satisfied with the resolution provided.
The package arrived today and everything looks good. Thank you for your assistance and support throughout this issue.
We are glad to hear your package arrived safely. Closing the case now, but feel free to reach out if you need any further assistance.
